com.nexmo.client.voice.endpoints

Class CallsEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nexmo.client.voice.endpoints.CallsEndpoint

  • public class CallsEndpoint
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents Nexmo Voice API endpoints below 
    /calls
    , and provides methods to read and update those endpoints.

    • Method Detail

      • post

        public CallEvent post(Call callRequest)
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      NexmoClientException
        Start a call configured by the provided Call object.

        Requires a JWTAuthMethod to be provided to the NexmoClient which constructs

        Parameters:
        callRequest - A Call object configuring the call to be created
        Returns:
        A CallEvent describing the call that was initiated.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs communicating with the Nexmo API
        NexmoClientException - if an error occurs constructing the Nexmo API request or response

      • get

        public CallInfoPage get(CallsFilter filter)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        NexmoClientException
        List calls which have been conducted by
        Parameters:
        filter - A CallsFilter describing the calls to be searched, or null for all calls.
        Returns:
        A CallInfoPage containing a single page of CallInfo results
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs communicating with the Nexmo API
        NexmoClientException - if an error occurs constructing the Nexmo API request or response

      • get

        public CallInfo get(java.lang.String uuid)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    NexmoClientException
        List calls which have been conducted by
        Parameters:
        uuid - The uuid of the CallInfo object to be retrieved
        Returns:
        A CallInfo object describing the state of the call that was made or is in progress
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs communicating with the Nexmo API
        NexmoClientException - if an error occurs constructing the Nexmo API request or response

      • put

        public ModifyCallResponse put(java.lang.String uuid,
                              java.lang.String action)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              NexmoClientException
        Modify an ongoing call.

        Currently this method only supports the "hangup" action.

        Parameters:
        uuid - The uuid of the CallInfo object to be modified
        Returns:
        A ModifyCallResponse object describing the state of the call that was modified
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs communicating with the Nexmo API
        NexmoClientException - if an error occurs constructing the Nexmo API request or response
